name: kontainer-js
description: A media file format generator/parser that exposes a React-like API.

scripts.clean: npm run clean-src && npm run clean-test && npm run clean-bundle
scripts.clean-browser: rm -fR concatenated ; mkdir concatenated ; rm -fR minified ; mkdir minified
scripts.build: npm run clean-browser && npm run bundle
scripts.release-build: npm run clean-browser && npm run release-bundle && npm run minify
scripts.transpile: npm run transpile-src && npm run transpile-test
scripts.transpile-src: npm run clean-src && babel src/ --out-dir transpiled/src/
scripts.transpile-test: npm run clean-test && babel test/ --out-dir transpiled/test/
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-node && npm run test-browser

author: Kuu Miyazaki
